TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable beforefieldinit StackFrame extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供关于 （表示当前线程的调用堆栈中的一个函数调用）的信息。

span.span: Provides information about a , which represents a function call on the call stack for the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个被创建并在线程的执行期间所做的每个函数调用的调用堆栈上推送。A is created and pushed on the call stack for every function call made during the execution of a thread. 堆栈帧始终包括信息，并根据需要包括文件名、 行号和列号等信息。The stack frame always includes information, and optionally includes file name, line number, and column number information. 将最信息性与调试生成配置信息。 information will be most informative with Debug build configurations. 默认情况下，调试版本中包含调试符号，而发布版本不能。By default, Debug builds include debug symbols, while Release builds do not. 调试符号包含大部分文件、 方法名称、 行号和列信息用于构造对象。The debug symbols contain most of the file, method name, line number, and column information used in constructing objects. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将类以提供堆栈跟踪的堆栈帧信息。The following example demonstrates the use of the class to provide the stack frame information for a stack trace. [!code-csharp[StackFrameSample2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/stackframesample2/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StackFrameSample2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/stackframesample2/vb/program.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示使用的成员类。The following example demonstrates the use of the members of the class. [!code-cpp[StackFrameSample1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StackFrameSample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StackFrameSample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取文件中包含所执行代码的列号。

span.span: Gets the column number in the file that contains the code that is executing.

summary.span: 该信息通常从可执行文件的调试符号中提取。

span.span: This information is typically extracted from the debugging symbols for the executable.

returns.span: 文件列号；如果无法确定文件列号，则为 0（零）。

span.span: The file column number, or 0 (zero) if the file column number cannot be determined.

summary.span: 获取离开所执行方法的 Microsoft 中间语言 (Microsoft Intermediate Language, MSIL) 代码开头的偏移量。

span.span: Gets the offset from the start of the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) code for the method that is executing.

summary.span: 根据实时 (JIT) 编译器是否正在生成调试代码，此偏移量可能是近似量。

span.span: This offset might be an approximation depending on whether or not the just-in-time (JIT) compiler is generating debugging code.

summary.span: 该调试信息的生成受 控制。

span.span: The generation of this debugging information is controlled by the .

returns.span: 离开所执行方法的 MSIL 代码开头的偏移量。

span.span: The offset from the start of the MSIL code for the method that is executing.

summary.span: 获取在其中执行帧的方法。

span.span: Gets the method in which the frame is executing.
The method in which the frame is executing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前正在执行的方法可能继承自基类，尽管在派生类中调用。The method that is currently executing may be inherited from a base class, although it is called in a derived class. 在这种情况下，的属性返回的对象标识的基类，不是派生的类。In this case, the property of the object that is returned by identifies the base class, not the derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取相对于所执行方法的本机实时 (JIT) 编译代码开头的偏移量。

span.span: Gets the offset from the start of the native just-in-time (JIT)-compiled code for the method that is being executed.

summary.span: 该调试信息的生成受 类控制。

span.span: The generation of this debugging information is controlled by the class.

returns.span: 相对于所执行方法的 JIT 编译代码开头的偏移量。

span.span: The offset from the start of the JIT-compiled code for the method that is being executed.
